about_the_game:
All the music tracks from the game. Buy this DLC to support our musician!
Music by Vova Sedykh aka BxCx. Search for his songs on the web!

Track Listing
  • Mad Mode
  • Robot attack
  • Impact Drill
  • Dance Macabre
  • Rave to the Grave
  • Rise and Kill
  • Everybody needs 303 legs
  • Green Green Goo
  • Mutant stand
  • Hail to the boss

Additionally: All the tracks above as they are in the game (without post-processing)
